channel.title: Selling house
channel.description:
Well my mom really wants to sell our house, so her idea was to create a site at zoomshare.com or something and I told her not to, that i would set one up.
Wel its not really mine at all, my friend sent me the layout, i added a hit counter from some site, and i added expanding tooltips from some one, so I am not taking much credit for it, but anyways, can i get a few opinions on how it looks? Maybe a few ideas on what should be added or tell me if it looks liek i forgot any information. Thanks for looking.
http://mixscape.hopto.org/home

item.title: Selling house
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Hmm, na not broken, nicer then a lot ive seen, not sure about it but we had it professionally appraised a while back for like $75,000 or something, and spend like 7k to add another room and a living room… The only minus I can think is ONE time some people at a dam a few towns down closed the dam at the wrong time and it flooded out the trailor court behind me, only seriously damaged like 3 trailers, the water didnt cause any damage to our house, but you could see it in the vents if you looked down em lol. But yea, they fixed the issue so it shouldn’t ever happen again. Only other thing I can think is its kinda close to a main state route, traffic isn’t bad though and its not nearly as close as my neighbors (we are about 175 feet away i think, they are like 15)

But on topic, I am going to try and get a few pics of it later, you guys think the layout looks ok for them, so i can jsut continue htrowing em in like that, or should it be changed?

Read full topic

item.title: Selling house
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

Pwnd:

Is the house broken or something? I’d agree with everyone else that says it’s insanely cheap.

lol yeah its $400,000 (changed currencys to USD because my pound sign is fucked) for a 3 bed bungalo XD and like $100,000 more for a house

Read full topic

item.title: Selling house
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Wow, that’s pretty cheap for that house.

(ThatOneServer- Are houses where you live really $750 grand for a three bedroom house? My house is a five bedroom and three bathroom house. Three stories + basement. And it was only around $500 grand.)

Read full topic

item.title: Selling house
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

The houses over there are cheap. Most houses here are 750grand+.(for a 3 bed)

Never put a site with your phone number on a cheating community.

Read full topic

item.title: Selling house
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Lol, ty, my mom will love to hear taht some one complimented our house, shes starting to think that every one hates it cause its been for sale for 3 years. but yea its more of a review of the site then the house

As for pics, the only camera we have is my ps2 eyetoy, its to late now, so you guys think it would produce ok images? then i could just walk around my house to get a nice set of pics of it

Read full topic

item.title: Selling house
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Hmm, ok, so first I will download opera again and see what you meen, and we are going to add more pics for it, just haven’t got a camera yet lol. That was the best template I saw when I was searching, though idk if i checked that site so I will look there.

Hows it look now? The code is a bit messy but I added padding and a few more tables, thats the best I could get it to look, as for a new layout, I don’t really see any simple enough on that site, my mom said since its just an add it she doesn’t want it really fancy.

Read full topic
